title: Fieldwork-Based Mathematics Internship Program for Corporate Leaders

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A mathematics application program combining field practice and theoretical learning for managers/leaders aged 40+. Operated with a focus on formative assessment using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and analyze at least three real-world mathematical problems encountered in workplace settings and select appropriate analytical tools.
Learners can apply statistical methods in data-driven decision-making processes to propose alternative solutions.
Learners can design a mathematical modeling process and prepare a results report based on a project.

resources: Practical Mathematics Software for Hands-On Learning

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
